mapper.insert: insert into sf_user_turn_table_record (id, create_time, create_man, user_id, turn_table_id, gift_id, gorder_id, status, update_time, remark) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createMan,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{turnTableId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{giftId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gorderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update sf_user_turn_table_record set create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_man = #{createMan,jdbcType=BIGINT}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, turn_table_id = #{turnTableId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, gift_id = #{giftId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, gorder_id = #{gorderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, create_time, create_man, user_id, turn_table_id, gift_id, gorder_id, status, update_time, remark from sf_user_turn_table_record where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select id, create_time, create_man, user_id, turn_table_id, gift_id, gorder_id, status, update_time, remark from sf_user_turn_table_record
select id, create_time, create_man, user_id, turn_table_id, gift_id, gorder_id, status, update_time, remark from sf_user_turn_table_record WHERE turn_table_id = #{turnTableId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select id, create_time, create_man, user_id, turn_table_id, gift_id, gorder_id, status, update_time, remark from sf_user_turn_table_record WHERE user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT} ORDER BY create_time DESC
